availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. McDaniel (representative from Gallatin County, Kentucky)

body.p: Gallatin County, Kentucky politician and trader. Kentucky native. Married to Arena McDaniel. Father of John McDaniel, Flora McDaniel, and James McDaniel. Owned five enslaved persons in 1860. Represented Gallatin County in the Kentucky House of Representatives from 1857 to 1859. Trader in Gallatin County in 1860.

bibl.p: Journal of the House of Representatives, (Frankfort, Ky.: A. G. Hodges, Public Printer, 1857); Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, History of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, Ky.: Collins & Co., 1878), 287; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 17; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, p. 4.
